name: Sculley Brothers
overview: Sculley Brothers, L.L.C. is a venture capital firm specializing in startup investments. It prefers to invest in financial services, communication, media, entertainment, technology, business-to-business, enabling technologies, Internet services, and consumer businesses. The firm primarily invests in New York, Israel, Silicon Valley, and Bermuda. Sculley Brothers, L.L.C. was co- founded by Mr. Arthur Sculley, Mr. David Sculley, and Mr. John Sculley in 1995 and is based in New York, New York.
